thread.title: Ciro Immobile double puts Lazio fourth while Arsenal target Andrea Belotti hits hat-trick for Torino
thread.title_full: Ciro Immobile double puts Lazio fourth while Arsenal target Andrea Belotti hits hat-trick for Torino

author: Jack Rathborn
title: Ciro Immobile double puts Lazio fourth while Arsenal target Andrea Belotti hits hat-trick for Torino
text:
Ciro Immobile continued his fine season for Lazio by hitting a brace (Photo: ANSA)   
Ciro Immobile hit a double to help Lazio past Bologna in the late game in Serie A and move into fourth spot. 
The Azzurri forward headed in Senad Lulic's cross before racing clear and coolly slotting home a second at the Stadio Renato Dall'Ara. 
Elsewhere, Immobile's Italy strike partner and the current capocannoniere leader, Andrea Belotti, hit a sublime volley on his way to a hat-trick to earn Torino a 3-1 win over Palermo. 
Il Gallo, who has been linked with Arsenal and Chelsea, now has 22 for the season - three more than his nearest rivals Edin Dzeko and Gonzalo Higuain. And Sunday's treble is likely to push Europe's biggest clubs to contemplate meeting the 23-year-old's â‚¬100m buy-out clause. Andrea Belotti continued his phenomenal season vs Palermo (Photo: LightRocket) 
The champions Juventus were held 1-1 at Udinese, with Leonardo Bonucci back in Massimiliano Allegri's good books after cancelling out Duvan Zapata's opener. The Old Lady remain eight points clear at the top of the table. 
Inter remain in the hunt for a Champions League place after a thumping 5-1 win at Cagliari, with Ever Banega's delightful free-kick and Roberto Gagliardini's driven finish from range the pick of the goals.
